text: Morning <@U5X5V3NAE>, as a bit of background I work for a real estate investment fund on the transaction side focused on retail and office assets. I understand that you are interested in going into law with a potential real estate focus so hopefully I will be able to help you get a better understanding of the industry and answer any questions you might have. I will do my best to get back to you on anything as quickly as possible but I apologies in advance if there are some delays! Tom
